Module Simulator
Package kin.env.trigger

Class BarrierTrigger

java.lang.Object
kin.env.trigger.EnvironmentTrigger
kin.env.trigger.BarrierTrigger
Direct Known Subclasses:
BallBarrierTrigger, CuboidBarrierTrigger
public abstract class BarrierTrigger
extends EnvironmentTrigger
Superclass of definitions of triggers that occur when an object goes beyond a barrier line.
